physical_examinations.vital_signs: Weight: 3970 g, Length: 53 cm, Plasma Na: 133 mmol/L, Plasma K: 5.7 mmol/L
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Hyponatremia and hyperkalemia at age of 9 months.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Initially presented failure to thrive, which worsened by 9 months with dehydration and malnutrition.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: Plasma Na: 117 mmol/L, Plasma K: 10.5 mmol/L, Weight: 31 mEq/kg/d of sodium chloride required
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Growth retardation (-1.9 SDS) and moderate psychomotor delay.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Comparison of 2-year findings to those at earlier age shows increased sodium requirement and growth issues.
